import React , {useContext} from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import {ShopContext} from '../../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' const CartItems = () => { const{all_product,cartItems,removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext); //access all the data and functions return (

Products

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id]>0){ return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

${e.new_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}} alt= ""/>
} return null; })}

cart Totals

) } export default CartItems //
